Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI is much more accessible than my supervisors in terms of response time, so it makes things a bit faster.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: I think I have more comfort and trust in the authority and expertise of my supervisors than I do in GenAI.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: Feedback from my supervisors are more personalised--they understand how I think and work and are better able to tailor their feedback to this.
